QVDReader

public QVDReader(java.lang.String fileName,
                 boolean useCache)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Creates QVDReader instance

Parameters:
fileName - QVD file name to read
useCache - if true, disk is used to cache QVD symbols, use for large QVD files and smaller memory footprint (performamce trade-off)
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

QVDReader

public QVDReader(java.lang.String fileName,
                 java.lang.String[] fieldList,
                 java.lang.String nullTag,
                 boolean useCache)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Creates QVDReader instance

Parameters:
fileName - QVD file name to read
fieldList - Fields to read (a subset of the QVD fields)
nullTag - tag for NULL value (e.g. "<null>") if no tag is given NULL will returned as empty String
useCache - if true, disk is used to cache QVD symbols, use for large QVD files and smaller memory footprint (performamce trade-off)

java.io.FileNotFoundException
